dcterms:description: A dataset containing 5,001,460 daily Tweets crawled by using Twitter online streaming API from 1st April 2011 to 31st May 2011, focusing on the United States, specifically related to four tech companies: Apple (AAPL), Google (GOOG), Microsoft (MSFT), and Amazon (AMZN).
dcterms:title: Twitter Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 41 days of stock market open days of data, excluding weekends and public holidays, used for predicting daily up and down changes of Apple (AAPL), Google (GOOG), Microsoft (MSFT), and Amazon (AMZN) stocks.
dcterms:title: Stock Market Data

dcterms:description: A dataset containing Yahoo! Finance data used to compute daily up and down of stock market changes.
dcterms:title: Yahoo! Finance Data
